version_description: Everything is new in this version! We've relaunched Epicurious and redesigned the entire app. It's like a gut kitchen renovation, only with a few million lines of code.

We cleaned up the kitchen after the launch party. Missing recipe boxes have been recovered and should be appearing. A pesky recipe search error on iPhone has been eliminated, as well. The app loads smoother and is more stable as well. We also remembered to buy milk and eggs from the store.

We cleaned up the kitchen after the launch party. Missing recipe boxes have been recovered and should be appearing. A pesky recipe search error on iPhone has been eliminated, as well. The app loads smoother and is more stable as well. We also remembered to buy milk and eggs from the store.

If you've got an Apple Watch, a wrist, or an iPhone, you're in luck! We've added a slew of new features for our Smart Timer, including the mighty Glance, the astonishing Handoff, and a list of our most popular timers, so you can get cooking without ever unlocking your iPhone.

For everyone who doesn't have Apple Watch? You have to check out our new Smart Timer. It'll tell you how to cook just about anything — no recipes required.

IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT: We love that you’re using our app, but it's critical that you upgrade your app and use this version. It will no longer work properly if you remain on an older version. If you’re unable to install the update for some reason, you can still view our recipes — and your recipe box — by going to our website, Epicurious.com. And you can keep up with everything we’re doing by following us on Apple News. The new version of the app is more stable, faster, and paves the way for future innovations. Thanks so much for using our app for the past six years.

We went away and spent the last couple months fixing some bugs. A lot of bugs. Like all of the bugs we could find. So, if you're a fan of improved performance and stability? You'll love this build. And if you're taking great pictures of the food you're cooking from the app, we want to know about it. Just use the hashtag #cookit. Thanks for supporting us!

Brand new for iOS 10! The reimagined Epicurious app makes it easier than ever to find the world’s best recipes, watch incredible food videos, and cook delicious meals.

New features include:

- Vastly improved search experience
- Feeds of latest recipe and videos
- Redesigned recipe box
- Redesigned shopping list
- Redesigned smart kitchen timer
- Streamlined access to our seasonal ingredients finder
- Ingredients toggle: view ingredients with just a tap of a button

Thanks for using the new Epicurious app! We've squashed a few bugs including several crash-causing events. The app is also more resilient on intermittent internet connections to help reduce data loading errors.

What's new:

- You can now log into Epicurious with your iCloud keychain
- Our revamped Settings screen is more organized and easier on your eyes
This update includes additional bug fixes and performance tweaks.

New things we done did in this update include:

- The ability to print recipes on wood-based media! Just use the recipe share menu to find the print option.
- An option to sort your recipe box alphabetically.
- Line wrapping in the shopping list, so your ingredients never get cut off.
- A new more helpful help section to help you.

- Many users were reporting that the app was crashing. We've fixed this for you!
- Performance improvements and minor bug fixes

- Some users were reporting crashes happening on some recipes. We've fixed this for you!
- Minor bug fixes.

- Fix search crashes.
- Minor bug fixes.
Fixed some crashes, squashed some bugs, and swung by the grocery store on our way home from work. Hope you like chicken!
Fixed some bugs, made everything perfect for iPhone X, and added a ton of pie recipes (#thanksgiving).
Thanks for using the Epicurious app! This update includes additional bug fixes and performance tweaks.
Thanks for using the Epicurious app! This update includes additional bug fixes and performance tweaks.

- Adds support to follow new orders from the head chef (our database).
- Fixed: Chasing some big nasty bugs out of the kitchen.
Thanks for using the Epicurious app! This update includes additional bug fixes and performance tweaks.

- Added: Better support for iPhone XR and XS Max.

Fixed bug preventing users from logging in, registering as a new user, or resetting their passwords.
privacy policy update
